title: If You've Never Listened Before, Start Here - Trailer
description: First time listening? This trailer will tell you which episode to start with, explain what the show is all about and ultimately give you a little taste for whether Creative Pep Talk is gonna be your kinda thing.
author: andy@andy-j-miller.com (Co-Loop Podcast Network)
